title: League IQ test for ranked
body: So i honestly think there needs to be a league iq test. The reason being is there are too many fking retarded fktards who have there head up there ass in higher elo. When they should be a in lower shit elo where they belong. This would also help players who are stuck in elo hell because of these fking retarded fktards which we all know and see every day and honestly probably wishing they would just commit suicide and make the world a better place, but we can always have what we want so we need to send these people to bronze where there retarded brains belong.

replies.body: There would just be a cheat sheet to make it pointless. It's also not amusing the way you speak of people just for performing poorly; you have around the same Rank/MMR that they do, so...

i have the best decisions ever, on what should be done, when, whats going to happen, etc, im the smartest person in the room by far, and it literally has carried me up through gold.

but i recognize my reaction time is a bit slower than average and i cant ever compete at that level, should i be diamond? no

platinum? maybe (ive played with all plats before and its amazing when team mates listen, this is finally what i want, they do what i ask, it gets done, we take the infernal drake/hide in baron brush, we win the game. gg ez)

theres always some degree of mechanix you have to do or be able to perform.

Skill isn't defined by IQ. I don't know which is the worse between the ones stuck in what you call ''elo hell'', and toxic as fuck ''high IQ'' players proving that they are superior by creating such friendly posts.
With an idea like that im pretty sure you would get placed in b5 and locked there forever
thank god im in wood division, i never have to deal with toxic assholes like OP.
Nice shitpost my friend. Elo Hell doesn't exist. You're probably in low elo because you make mistakes and are toxic. Flaming your teammates will make you lose games.

One shouldn't speak about IQ tests in a rant written like an angry middle schooler.

To answer all of your questions it wouldn't just be an iq test to be placed. An IQ test would be half of it, and the other half would be the placement games. People always get screwed via afks or bullshitt teamates we have all been there. This would greatly reduce that by evenly judging each quality of the player.
So by doing this test you'd find yourself in bronze 5?

You want to see riot employees sleeping under a bridge instead of eating donuts and going to the gym?
Because that's how you would kill 98% of their playerbase...

Imagine how fucking stupid the average person is, well, 50% of the human population is below that level.

IQ tests doesn't mean much, you can have a high IQ, but not be skilled in league and vice versa.

If you want to grind out and climb ranks just pick a few of the top winrate champions (supports preferably) and play only them until you reach your desired rank. In janurary I climbed from gold 5 -> plat 3 queueing as jungle/support and playing mostly diana/janna in ~40 games.
its always everyone else that is a fuckhead. you have the tone of a bronze ADC who screams at their support when they don't follow them in to a fail dive.
